INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY SPECIALIST

SUMMARY

Recent graduate seeking opportunity in hardware and software support.
Highly poised and dedicated with strong education and training in supporting computer issues.
Systematic IT professional proficient in network, project and emergency management.
Able to install hardware, patch software and configure internal systems.
Complex problem-solver with top-notch planning and communication strengths.
Resourceful team player and fast learner seeking to leverage background into a database administrator role with a progressive organization.

SKILLS

Hardware updates Process improvement implementation Permissions management Software licenses and patches Excellent problem solving skills Operating systems
Task estimation GUI and tools Knowledge of streaming video platforms Timeline management Operational support Windows operating systems

<JD_START>
Job Title: Senior Project Manager

Location: Newport News, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
The Senior Project Manager leads, plans, and heads the tasks of multiple field crews to implement projects for automated material handling projects. He/she will manage divisional resources to meet and exceed contract requirements, project specifications, and client expectations. Projects are successfully implemented through skillful proposal/contract/specification review, contract drawing review, site surveys, system design, materials procurement and scheduling, installation drawing design and review, installation scheduling, labor coordination, cost management, change order processing, project completion and close out.

Responsibilities

Represent the interests of Swisslog in dealing with the project client, the client’s consultants and Swisslog’s subcontractors.Participate in the offer reviews and on acceptance of the offer, ensure the Swisslog minimum contract standards are taken into account in the setup of the project workbook, financials, project management plan and schedule.Supervise and coordinate the installation and assembly work of all equipment and products delivered as part of scope of supply for the customer and ensure successful claim management for time and money is implemented and maintained.Produce and/or review project documentation deliverables.Coordinate, review and sign-off the functional acceptance tests, integration tests and finally, the throughput tests of the overall system and confirm with acceptance reports signed by the subcontractor, Swisslog and the Customer.

Application Requirements

BS or MS degree in Mechanical Engineering, Industrial Engineering, or Systems EngineeringMinimum of 7+ years of project management experience. Primary experience preferably within automated material handling and logistics applications.MS Project experience.PMP Certification (preferred)Good understanding of Control and Software Systems for automated material handling equipment, preferred Sound application knowledge of automated material handling equipment such as AS/RS, pallet and case conveyors, sorters, AGV’s, monorailsGood integration skills for the management and control of a number of separate sub-systems within a project (nominal 6 vendors)Good negotiation skills, related to both procurement and contractual.Knowledge of PMBOK practices for project managementGood motivational skills, both in self and team membersAbility to listen and learn from othersExcellent written and verbal communication skillsExcellent leadership and organizational skills capable of managing more than one project of varying size and complexityDemonstrated presentation skills

About Swisslog

Swisslog is shaping the #future of #intralogistics. As part of the KUKA Group, we are at the forefront of technology that is changing the world. Serving some of the biggest and most exciting brands across the globe, we're a team of 2,000 professionals and 50 nationalities, working together to transform intralogistics with smart minds and fresh perspectives. With our flexible, #robotic and #data-driven automated solutions, we are powering the supply chain and taking the industry forward. #JoinOurTeam and bring ideas to life!

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
